name: viral-ngs-demux
title: illumina-demux
summary: Perform BCL conversion and de-multiplexing from Illumina RUN directory using viral-ngs' custom demux script

inputSpec.name: upload_sentinel_record
inputSpec.label: Incremental upload sentinel record
inputSpec.help: The sentinel record produced by the the incremental_upload.sh script. When this record is closed it indicates that the upload is complete and demux can begin.

inputSpec.name: run_tarballs
inputSpec.label: Tarball(s) that reconstitute the RUN folder
inputSpec.help: Tarball(s), supplied in the order that they should be untarred in, which reconstitute the RUN folder of a single sequencing run

inputSpec.name: lanes
inputSpec.label: Lane(s) to perform demux
inputSpec.help: If not specified, demux will be performed over all lane(s)

inputSpec.name: metrics_fn
inputSpec.label: Metric filename
inputSpec.help: Filename for output ExtractIlluminaBarcodes metrics file. Default is metrics.txt

inputSpec.name: barcodes_fn
inputSpec.label: Common Barcode Report filename
inputSpec.help: Filename for output CommonBarcodes report. Default is barcodes.txt

inputSpec.name: per_sample_output
inputSpec.label: Output samples in sub folders
inputSpec.help: Create subfolder for each sample output file

inputSpec.name: sample_sheet
inputSpec.label: Sample Sheet (override)
inputSpec.help: Override SampleSheet. Input tab or CSV file w/header and four named columns:barcode_name, library_name, barcode_sequence_1, barcode_sequence_2. Default is to look for a SampleSheet.csv in the inDir.

inputSpec.name: flowcell
inputSpec.label: Flowcell ID
inputSpec.help: Override flowcell ID (default: read from RunInfo.xml)

inputSpec.name: read_structure
inputSpec.label: Read structure
inputSpec.help: Override read structure (default: read from RunInfo.xml).

inputSpec.name: advanced_opt
inputSpec.label: Advanced options
inputSpec.help: Additional advanced parameter to be passed to illumina.py

outputSpec.name: unmatched_bams
outputSpec.label: Unmatched Bam files
outputSpec.help: Unmatched bam files from demultiplexing (may be empty)

outputSpec.name: barcodes
outputSpec.label: Report of barcode counts
outputSpec.help: TSV report of all barcode counts, in descending order
